title: Mentora - LMS Platform
description: A MERN stack learning management system with role-based dashboards for admin, teacher, and student. Features include class management, assignments, JWT auth, Stripe payments, Firebase login, and responsive UI built with React & Tailwind CSS.

title: Hotel Booking App
description: A MERN stack hotel booking platform with real-time room availability, booking management, and user reviews. Includes role-based dashboards for customers and admins, responsive design with React & Tailwind CSS, and Firebase authentication.

title: Mobile POS App
description: A cross-platform POS and inventory management app for small businesses with Bluetooth printer integration. Features include sales tracking, product management, invoice generation, and Firebase backend, built with Flutter for a smooth and responsive user experience.
